content: Yes, Tidal has features that allow you to create and share playlists, so you can easily curate your own personalized Beethoven playlists and share them with friends or save them for future listening. You can also connect with other Tidal users and share your favorite classical music tracks, artists or composers, as well as join various groups and communities dedicated to classical music. Moreover, Tidal's music recommendation algorithm suggests new and similar music based on your listening habits, so you can discover other classical composers or pieces that you may enjoy.
